Posts.Content: Nov 6, 2015 10:16AM KristinB577 wrote: What was the outcome of your radiation treatment Patti? I am on 7/10 today and haven't seen an improvement. I'm hoping that my vision will improve. Meow13 I didn't have anything noticable by physically looking at my eye. I had blurred vision in one eye and like Patti just thought I needed glasses. Turns out I had stage 4 breast cancer.
Posts.Title: Mets in eyes KristinB577 patti4511

Posts.Content: KristinB577 wrote: I have mets in my eyes that I am currently receiving radiation for. In fact this was the first symptom (that I paid attention to) and then the breast lump was discovered. I know this type of met is very rare but I'm wondering if anyone here might have experience with it. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mets in eyes KristinB577 patti4511

Posts.Content: Nov 6, 2015 02:09AM KristinB577 wrote: I'm new here and newly diagnosed. But I'm in awe of how you women are taking charge and living your lives as if they are just as they always were (I mean that it a very positive way). I am struggling with dealing with it all as a single mom to two very high energy kids. The diagnoses and treatments are all still very new and I'm hoping I can get to feeling like I can do this and still live a good life for my kids. It's scary as hell.
